name: Piramida Nightingale
desc: A drink whose colors are clear and elegant â€” this one does not appear to contain any alcohol. Legend has it that the Torchforger, Solovei, once gifted someone a nightingale, and that moment served as the inspiration for this drink. Now, only the nightingale's song remains, lingering amid the tranquil night.

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 1,750 HP to the selected character.
